amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 118-4 to require that the inflationary report take into account the spending patterns of military personnel, rural areas, and farm households.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bost amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 324 - 83 (Roll no. 125).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Bost.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bost amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 324 - 83 (Roll no. 125).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
